arts.ttl: Lazio Confident in Securing Agreement With Chelsea After Improving Their Bid for Young Midfielder
arts.sum: Lazio are reportedly increasingly optimistic about reaching a definitive agreement with Chelsea on the transfer of Cesare Casadei. arts.ttl: Lazio Make Short Work of Real Sociedad To Reach Europa League Round of 16
arts.sum: Lazio have officially booked their place in the Europa League Round of 16 by comfortably beating Real Sociedad at the Stadio Olimpico in Rome. arts.ttl: Europa League | Lazio 3-1 Real Sociedad: Match Report
arts.sum: Lazio secured their spot in the Europa League top eight with a commanding 3-1 victory over Real Sociedad, who were reduced to 10 men early in the match. The Biancocelesti's impressive performance was highlighted by goals from Mario Gila, Taty Castellanos, and Mattia Zaccagni.
